text: Mae Jarvis is a fictional character on the CBS crime drama Criminal Minds: Beyond Borders, portrayed by Annie Funke. ==Background== Jarvis is a medical examiner and special agent with the FBI's International Response Team (IRT). Young and spunky, Mae has a loving sibling-like relationship with Matthew Simmons and was in the FBI purely as a medical examiner, and in the first episode Clara Seger saw Jarvis out of scrubs for the first time. Jarvis was brought onto the IRT as a resident medical examiner to bypass the bureaucratic red tape in various countries. ==Personal life== Jarvis was briefly engaged to a man but later called off the wedding due to her devotion to her job with the IRT. ==References== ==External links== * Mae Jarvis on IMDb Category:Criminal Minds characters Category:Fictional Federal Bureau of Investigation personnel Category:Fictional medical examiners Category:Television characters introduced in 2016 Category:Criminal Minds: Beyond Borders Category:American female characters in television
title: Mae Jarvis
